titleStmt.title: The voyce of Providence asserted, and the followers of God in the waies of His Providence justified in a letter sent by John Hinde to a minister in London, who denied the former and condemned the latter.
titleStmt.author: Hinde, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, at the Printing-press, by the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
